text: The King's Jutlandic Regiment of Foot () was a Royal Danish Army infantry regiment. On 1 November 1991, it was merged with the Funen Life Regiment, into Schleswig Regiment of Foot. ==History== The King's Jutlandic Regiment of Foot brings in both the history's (and name's) from the two regiments Jutlandic Regiment of Foot and King's Regiment of Foot ==Organisation== * 1st battalion (I/KJFR), Founded 1961, Disband 1990. Mechanized Infantry Battalion ** 25px Staff Company ** 25px 1st Armored Infantry Company ** 25px 2nd Armored Infantry Company ** 25px 3rd Tank Squadron (along with 25px from 1981 to 1988) ** 25px 4th Motorised Infantry Company * 2nd battalion (II/KJFR), Founded 1961, Disband 1990. Infantry Battalion. ** 25px Staff Company ** 25px 1st Motorised Infantry Company ** 25px 2nd Motorised Infantry Company ** 25px 3rd Motorised Infantry Company (same shield whit color Blue/White at the top bar) * 3rd battalion (III/KJFR), Founded 1961, Disband 1990. Infantry Battalion. ** 25px Staff Company ** 25px 1st Motorised Infantry Company ** 25px 2nd Motorised Infantry Company ** 25px 3rd Motorised Infantry Company * 25px 1st Brigade Staff Company/1st Jutland Brigade, Founded 1961, Transferred to Signal Regiment in 1991 ==Names of the regiment== {| class="toccolours" style="float: auto; clear: right; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em;" |+ style="font-size: larger; margin-left: 1em;"|Names |- style="vertical-align: top;" |2. Bataillon||2nd Battalion ||12. Bataillon ||12th Battalion||width="1%"| 1857 ||width="1%"|–||width="1%"| 1951 |- style="vertical-align: top;" |9. Regiment (Kongens Fodregiment)||9th Regiment (King's Regiment of Foot) ||7. Regiment (Jyske Fodregiment)||7th Regiment (Jutlandic Regiment of Foot)||width="1%"| 1951 ||width="1%"|–||width="1%"| 1961 |- style="vertical-align: top;" |Kongens Fodregiment||King's Regiment of Foot||Jyske Fodregiment||Jutlandic Regiment of Foot||width="1%"| 1961 ||width="1%"|–||width="1%"| 1961 |- style="vertical- align: top;" | ||amalgamation||01-11-1961|| ||width="1%"| ||width="1%"| ||width="1%"| |- style="vertical-align: top;" | ||Kongens Jyske Fodregiment||King's Jutlandic Regiment of Foot|| ||width="1%"| 1961 ||width="1%"|–||width="1%"| 1991 |} ==References== * Lærebog for Hærens Menige, Hærkommandoen, marts 1960 * http://www.kongensjyskefodregiment.dk/ Category:Danish Army regiments Category:Military units and formations disestablished in 1961
title: King's Jutlandic Regiment of Foot
